bibl.title: Papyrus and Parchment: Additional Problems in the Transmission of 8th-century Theological Texts.
bibl.note: The use of papyrus was still current in places like the papal chancery and other administrative centers [up until the eleventh century]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Alexander Alexakis, Papyrus and Parchment: Additional Problems in the Transmission of 8th-century Theological Texts.
